content: this easy-to-follow christmas tree hat pattern includes instructions for toddlers kids and adults so you can make matching crochet hats for the whole family this holiday season keep everyone s head warm with this very unique and festive crochet christmas tree hat - the pattern comes in three sizes toddler 2-4 years child 4+ years & adult - the hat is practical as it will keep everyone s head nice and warm - it is also very unique and festive a perfect christmas hat to wear for christmas cards or to make as crochet christmas gifts - you can use any size 4 medium 100% acrylic yarn it s best if it has some stretch to it - the pattern includes lots of pictures and instructions for each size the hat ribbing and pom pom
